original: Bergquist, Thorwald Erik Natanael, landshövdmg, förutv. »statsTåd, Växjö, f. 1/12/99 i Nävelsjö, Jönköp. 1., av kon-tr :prosten Fingal B. o, Anna Östberg. G. 28 m. Ingrid Chrysander. Barn: Lars f. 30, Olof 33, Mats 38. — Fil. kand. i Lund 19, jur. kand. 22. Tf. fiskal i Svea hovr. 27, e. o. assessor 30, sekr. i riksd. andra lagutsk. 31, borgm. i Västerås 31-39, gen :dir. o. chef f. soc :styr. 39-46, statsråd o. chef. f. ju’St:dep. 36 -samt 43-45, -kons. statsråd 39-43, landshövd. i Kronob. 1. sed. 46. Fd. ordf. i hälsov:ndn, byggn:ndn o. istadsipdanendn i Västerås, skiljedom. i järnv:tvist. f. Västmanl. 1. 32, ordf. i stödlånendn f. Västmanl. 1. 32-36, v. oTdf. i fören. Sv :es stads-dom. 38-39, sakk. inom just:dep. 33 o. 35, ordf. f. sakk. ang. beväpn. ensk. sammanslutn. 33, i interner :ndn 36-39 samt sed. 46, ordf. i 36 års uppbörds-komm., 36 års hyreslagstiftn :komm., 37 års landsfiskalskomm., 39 års pohs-utredn., 45 års civ :försv :utredn., soc:-vet:skapl. foTskn:komm. 45, byggn:-borgenärsutredn. 46, lönestatistiksakk. 46, alkoh :vårdsutredn. 46, riksdags-arb :utredn. 46, decentr :komm. 47, ordf. i statsdep. antagn :nd 40-46, i Sv. gymn:förb. 39-45, led. av riksd. andra kamm. (fp) 37-40 samt av första kamm. sed. 41, v. ordf. i första lagutsk. 37-39 ’samt 46. KmistkNO.
translated: Bergquist, Thorwald Erik Natanael, Governor, former "StatsTåd", Växjö, born on December 1, 1899 in Nävelsjö, Jönköping County, son of the parish priest Fingal B. and Anna Östberg. Married on 28th with Ingrid Chrysander. Children: Lars born in 1930, Olof in 1933, Mats in 1938. - Bachelor of Arts in Lund in 1919, Bachelor of Laws in 1922. Temporary prosecutor in Svea Court of Appeal in 1927, deputy judge in 1930, secretary in the Second Parliamentary Judiciary Committee in 1931, mayor of Västerås from 1931-1939, Director-General and Chief of Social Welfare Board from 1939-1946, Minister and Chief of Justice Department from 1936-1943 and again from 1943-1945, Consul for the Minister of Justice from 1939-1943, Governor of Kronoberg County since 1946. Former Chairman of the Health Committee, Building Committee, and Urban Planning Committee in Västerås, arbitrator in the railway dispute for Västmanland County in 1932, Chairman of the Support Loan Committee for Västmanland County from 1932-1936, Deputy Chairman of the Swedish Urban Courts Association from 1938-1939, Expert within the Ministry of Justice in 1933 and 1935, Chairman of the Experts on Armed Private Associations in 1933, in the Internment Committee from 1936 to 1939 and since 1946, Chairman of the 1936 Collection Committee, the 1936 Rental Legislation Committee, the 1937 County Bailiff Committee, the 1939 Police Investigation Committee, the 1945 Civil Defense Investigation Committee, the 1945 Social Welfare Research Committee, 1946 Building Guarantor Investigation Committee, 1946 Wage Statistics Expert, and 1946 Alcohol Care Investigation Committee, 1946 Parliamentary Labor Investigation Committee, and 1947 Decentralization Committee. Chairman of the Admission Committee for the Ministry of Education from 1940-1946 and the Swedish Gymnastics Federation from 1939-1945, Member of the Second Chamber of the Riksdag (Free Democratic Party) from 1937-1940 and the First Chamber since 1941, Deputy Chairman of the First Judicial Committee from 1937-1939 and 1946.
